game.name: IMAGO: Beyond the Nightmares
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: IMAGO is a psychological horror game set in a dark and hostile world between dream and reality, in which mysterious creatures hide inscrutable secrets. Play Marty Burton, the detective of dreams, to unravel the case and bring home a child who has disappeared under mysterious circumstances.
game.shortDescriptionEn: IMAGO is a psychological horror game set in a dark and hostile world between dream and reality, in which mysterious creatures hide inscrutable secrets. Play Marty Burton, the detective of dreams, to unravel the case and bring home a child who has disappeared under mysterious circumstances.
